title: TAIWAN STRAIT CRISIS
description: PLA forces conducting unprecedented military exercises near Taiwan. Amphibious landing capability detected. Diplomatic channels strained.

title: ARCTIC TERRITORIAL DISPUTE
description: Multiple nations racing to claim newly accessible Arctic resources. Military installations expanding. International law contested.

title: CRITICAL INFRASTRUCTURE BREACH
description: Coordinated cyber attack on power grid, financial systems, and military networks. State-sponsored origin suspected. Escalation risk severe.
